programme.title: WWE: WrestleMania 37

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution
programme.desc: A werewolf and a vampire, forbidden lovers, attempt to unlock the secret behind their tribes' feud.

programme.title: Underworld: Awakening
programme.desc: Humans wage war against Vampire and Lycan clans after learning of their existence.

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: Vampire death dealer Selene continues her struggle against the Lycans and Vampires that took everything from her. When she discovers the two factions are hunting her blood to become more powerful, she works to end the eternal war once and for all.

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: A vampire warrior finds herself falling in love with a human who has been bitten by a werewolf, the sworn enemies of her clan.

programme.title: Wild Singapore
programme.desc: In this first episode, we explore Singapore's hidden wilderness, overlooked areas of the island that are home to an astonishing variety of fascinating creatures.

programme.title: Attenborough and the Giant Elephant
programme.desc: The amazing life story of the most famous elephant to have ever lived: Jumbo. With scientists from around the world, Sir David has unique access to the elephant's skeleton at the American Museum of Natural History.

programme.title: Nature's Great Events
programme.desc: The summer melt of Arctic ice provides opportunities for millions of animals, including narwhal, beluga whales, families of Arctic foxes and vast colonies of seabirds. But for polar bears, it's the toughest time of year.

programme.title: Life Story
programme.desc: Each and every animal is born with a chance to survive, thrive and produce their very own next generation. The first hurdle in life is infancy.

programme.title: Wild India
programme.desc: India's Wild Karnataka follows some amazing creatures that live across this diverse land. Filmed over three years, dedicated camera teams have captured the wildlife of Karnataka as it has never been seen before.

programme.title: Planet Earth: A Celebration
programme.desc: This program highlights eight of the most extraordinary sequences from 'Planet Earth II' and 'Blue Planet II.' In addition to new narration, the sequences will include an arrangement of original scores from composer Hans Zimmer and Jacob Shea.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: The contests between predators and prey are the most dramatic events in nature. The premiere episode reveals the extraordinary range of techniques predators use to catch their prey.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Dynasties
programme.desc: The lioness leader of a once mighty pride must now battle for their very survival.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet
programme.desc: A land cast adrift at the time of the dinosaurs. Here, kangaroos and wombats brave snowstorms and gum tree forests are filled with never-before-seen predators.

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: The polar regions experience the planet's most extreme seasons and are home to some of its most surprising animal behaviours. Polar bears search and fight for mates, penguins surf and orcas hunt collaboratively.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Journey through Earth to discover the extraordinary diversity of animals and plants that exists today and the most extreme stories of survival nature has to offer.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: The ocean and many of its inhabitants, such as the blue whale, remain a mystery.

programme.title: Planet Earth: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: A journey from the intense heat of the tropics to the planet's frozen poles. Life has spread to almost every part of the ocean, but there are many different worlds within it, and each presents unique challenges.

programme.desc: A vampire warrior finds herself falling in love with a human who has been bitten by a werewolf, the sworn enemies of her clan.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The ultimate portrait of our planet looks at the key factors that shape our natural history. In the Arctic spring, a mother polar bear and cubs have two weeks to cross the frozen sea. Time-lapse cameras capture the transformation created by floods.

programme.title: Planet Earth II
programme.desc: For some, remote islands offer sanctuary away from the mainland: the tiny pygmy three-toed sloth only survives because of the peace and safety offered by its Caribbean island home, while seabirds like albatross thrive in predator-free isolation.

programme.title: Attenborough's Journey
programme.desc: As Sir David Attenborough enters his 94th year, this unique film presents a remarkable portrait of the man behind the legend.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: In Africa's ancient southwest corner, two deserts sit side by side; water is in short supply, yet these deserts are full of life because the creatures that live there have turned the rules of survival on their head.

programme.desc: A baby klipspringer is born on one of the coldest nights of the season and is miraculously nursed back to health. The California condor team at the Safari Park goes to unbelievable lengths to save this highly endangered species.

programme.title: The Zoo: San Diego
programme.desc: There will be no peace in the world for the hamadryas baboons until Impo finds his mate. Luckily, the San Diego Zoo keepers have a plan. Two young cheetah cubs are training to become animal ambassadors with the help of their experienced canine guide.

programme.title: The Zoo: San Diego
programme.desc: Hunter the koala is ready for a mate. Jaws the Galápagos tortoise isn't feeling well and the zoo staff works to bring him out of his shell. The Safari Park has not one but two baby giraffe calves that need to be hand-reared simultaneously.

programme.title: The Zoo: San Diego
programme.desc: Safari Park keepers prepare Aria the rambunctious black rhino for her new life on the open African Plains exhibit. Zoo staff cares for 15-year-old legend M'bari the lion and his mate, Etosha. A vulture chick learns to eat from a surrogate puppet.

programme.title: The Zoo: San Diego
programme.desc: The Zoo says goodbye to beloved pandas Bai-Yun and Xiao Liwu as mother and cub prepare to return to China. Tembo the retired 'Hollywood' elephant tries traditional Chinese medicine for her arthritis. The Butterfly Jungle gets colored for the season.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: A charismatic ostrich named Olga works to be reunited with her flock. Buster the squirrel monkey is introduced to the zoo's troop of feisty females. A functionally extinct species of turtle finds new life, and everyone's favorite warthog is back.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: A popular sea lion falls ill after ingesting a foreign object. The avian team devises a plan to increase the cock-of-the-rocks population. Endangered snakes are coupled for breeding, and Andean bear cubs meet their fans.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: The zoo anxiously awaits the arrival of a snow leopard called K2's fourth cub. The staff is pleased when a pair of Andean condors embrace their new enclosure, while a squirmy binturong fights his annual vaccination.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Two sickly newborn fawns form an unbreakable bond while they are hand-reared by staff. Leopard Khazo gets a surprise that enhances her life, and tensions run high as the reptile staff attempts to collect blood from Cuban crocs.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Max the camel faces new challenges as he ages. The zoo prepares to give an injured turkey vulture a permanent home, but after healing, there may be a change of plan. Willow the red panda gives birth to two baby cubs.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Villalobos faces one of their most challenging rescues when a house fire reveals a massive dog-hoarding situation. Two teachers fall in love with a deaf puppy they hope to give a forever home.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A potential best friend needs to pass a unique test before he can be adopted out. Parolee Jammall returns after a mysterious absence. A year after losing their house in a fire, M2 and Kanani do something special for the dog who saved their lives.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A potential adopter wants to give a forever home to a senior dog that has only known life in a kennel. M2 and Kanani are shocked when they find a box of puppies in a field. And, Matt and Earl head to the kitchen to cook up some fresh food for a sick dog.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: VRC is at its limit when the amount of rescues and drop-offs rise. Lizzy and Toney travel to a remote part of the city to save a trio of orphaned dogs in a dire state, veteran tenant Lil Rocky faces a cancer scare, and a litter of puppies are welcomed.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Now a mother of two, Lizzy leans on Tia to help find a work-life balance. A California couple hopes to adopt a dog comfortable in the pool, and Mariah's mission to save an injured dog abandoned in the rain leads her to something completely unexpected.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Earl returns from rehab, hoping to rebuild his life working with the dogs. A couple comes looking for a dog who can handle crowded streets of NYC. Lizzy rescues a dog after a confrontation with the owner who abandoned it.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A woman travels all the way from San Diego to give one of Villalobos' senior dogs a chance at a home. Lizzy and Marcel search for a mama dog's lost puppies out in the country. A new parolee makes a helpful discovery on his first day.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Now a mother of two, Lizzy leans on Tia to help find a work-life balance. A California couple hopes to adopt a dog comfortable in the pool, and Mariah's mission to save an injured dog abandoned in the rain leads her to something completely unexpected.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Maria begins a mission to have more dogs spayed and neutered when puppies get dumped at Villalobos. Tia races to save a dog that is running loose on the freeway and a heartbroken individual looks for a dog to help them heal.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia sends Mariah to California to rescue a former member of the VRC family. A puppy's behaviour puts her chances at a forever home at risk. After receiving a call about a pit bull, Tia jumps into action.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia rushes to the rescue of a dog left tied up in sweltering heat. Matt rescues a pit bull from death row and Tania and Parry decide to open their hearts and home to a new dog.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Egan sets up a decoy and checks hunters at a popular bird hunting site. Officers Towne and Bronson help rescue an injured hiker on Mount Kearsarge. Plus, Lt. Boudreau and Officer MacFadzen investigate a hunting on private property call.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Canfield meets a feisty swimmer looking for a fight. Anger reaches a boiling point when Officers Pushee and McKee ticket a dozen unruly ATV violators at once. And as Officer McKee monitors a sleeping bear, it becomes dangerously aggravated.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Holmes and trainee Frye respond to an ATV accident in which a man's head has been run over. Officer McKee helps relocate a rare rattlesnake. Officer Courtney assists a dog locked inside a car. On Mt. Willard, a collapsed student needs rescuing.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Crouse responds to a call about a nuisance raccoon, while Officer Towne searches for a deer attacked by coyotes. Officer Hannett monitors a suspicious fisherman and Officer St. Pierre responds to a call about an impaired driver.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Lt. Boudreau and Officer Hannett have an unusually busy day on ATV patrol. Officer McDermott investigates a man who illegally shot a rabbit in a residential area. Officers Holmes and Cyrs use ATVs to rescue an injured hiker on Mount Carter.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Egan investigates the mysterious death of a deer. Officer Courtney and Lt. Cheney help a seal stuck in a tidal creek. Officer Bronson catches a young fisherman in a lie. And Officers lead the search for a woman with a head injury.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Pre-dawn on opening day of rifle season, Lt. Boudreau and Officer Hannett pursue a night hunter. While up north, Officers Canfield and St. Pierre battle the snow to work a deer decoy. And in the city, Officer Frye wrestles an aggressive wild turkey.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: It's the opening of deer and oyster season in Texas. On the Gulf, Game Wardens find illegal undersized oysters. In East Texas, Game Wardens patrol deer camps. An owl is rescued from a chicken coop and set free.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Deer season is well underway across Texas. In East Texas, Game Wardens find a bobcat a new home and investigate an illegally killed deer. On the coast, the Texas Game Wardens deal with an outstanding warrant.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: The Game Wardens patrol the beach, lake and land, as summer is in full swing. Wardens educate a dog owner about leaving pets in the sun. An under-age drinker tells too many lies. Wardens inspect novice jet skiers on a busy recreational lake.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game wardens enforce the law across Texas. A hunting club has a trespassing issue. People are caught attempting to illegally cross the Rio Grande. An argument between neighbors is mediated. Fishermen receive citations on the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Foolhardy speedsters run afoul of wardens on a nighttime stakeout mission. Game Warden Mike Boone investigates reckless gunfire endangering life and property, and Game Warden Chelsea Bailey crosses paths with a wanted man during a routine safety check.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Warden Richards confronts a suspected poacher for illegally hunting ducks and geese. Wardens Ben and Chelsea Bailey monitor an injured deer running along a busy highway, and a man is arrested after confessing to poaching a deer.

programme.title: Lone Star Law

programme.title: Benfica x Porto
programme.desc: Pela 31ª rodada, Benfica e Porto fazem o grande clássico português no Estádio da Luz. As duas equipes precisam da vitória para continuar a perseguição ao líder Sporting.

programme.title: Leicester x Newcastle
programme.desc: Pela 35ª rodada, o Leicester CIty recebe o Newcastle United no King Power Stadium. Os Foxes tentam os três pontos para manter a 3ª posição e sua vaga na Champions. Já os Magpies, do outro lado da tabela, tentam sacramentar sua permanência na elite.

programme.title: Resenha ESPN

programme.title: Além da Bola

programme.title: Ajax x Emmen
programme.desc: Pela 31ª rodada, o Ajax recebe o Emmen na Johan Cruijff Arena, em Amsterdã. Os Ajacieden, caso vençam, levantam seu 35º título neerlandês. Já os rivais, que vêm de boa sequência de jogos, podem sair do Z-3 em caso de triunfo.

programme.title: Sheffield United x Crystal Palace
programme.desc: Pela 35ª rodada, o Sheffield United recebe o Crystal Palace no Estádio Bramall Lane. Os Blades tentam deixar seu fim de temporada na elite menos melancólico. Do outro lado, os Eagles precisam da vitória para garantir a permanência na elite.

programme.desc: Um panorama completo sobre o Campeonato Inglês ao redor do mundo. As últimas notícias, curiosidades, entrevistas com jogadores e técnicos e histórias sobre a paixão do torcedor pelo futebol inglês.

programme.title: Ceará x Bahia
programme.desc: No jogo de volta da final, o Ceará recebe o Bahia no estádio Castelão, em Fortaleza. Após emocionante vitória na ida, o Vovô pode até empatar que levanta o tricampeonato. Já o Tricolor precisa vencer de qualquer forma para tentar o tetra.

programme.title: Barcelona x Atlético de Madrid
programme.desc: Pela 35ª rodada, o Barcelona recebe o Atlético de Madrid no Camp Nou. A dois pontos do rival, os culés só dependem de si para levantar a taça e salvar a temporada. Já o Atléti não pode pensar em algo além da vitória caso queira manter a liderança.

programme.title: Manchester City x Chelsea
programme.desc: Pela 35ª rodada, o Manchester City recebe o Chelsea no Etihad Stadium. Em prévia da final da Champions, o City pode garantir o título se vencer. Os Blues também necessitam dos três pontos para manter a quarta posição, com chances de subir à terceira.

programme.title: Wolverhampton x Brighton
programme.desc: Pela 35ª rodada, o Wolverhampton Wanderers recebe o Brighton & Hove Albion no Estádio Molineux. No meio da tabela, apenas um dos times corre risco de rebaixamento, e são os Seagulls. Porém, caso vençam fora de casa, garantem a permanência na elite.

programme.title: Aston Villa x Manchester United
programme.desc: Pela 35ª rodada, o Aston Villa recebe o Manchester United no Villa Park. Os Villans tentam encerrar a chance de título dos rivais, já que não têm possibilidades de beliscar algo nesta campanha. Os Red Devils também tentam assegurar vaga na Champions.

programme.title: Villarreal x Celta de Vigo

programme.title: Real Madrid x Sevilla

programme.title: Liverpool x Southampton
programme.desc: Pela 35ª rodada, o Liverpool recebe o Southampton no Estádio Anfiled Road. Os Reds precisam da vitória para continuarem com chances de vaga na Champions. Já os Saints garantem a permanência na elite na próxima temporada se conseguir os três pontos.

programme.desc: On Ann and Chris' last night in Pawnee, Leslie throws a grand farewell party and attempts to fulfil one last promise.

programme.desc: After Leslie tries to take down the wall separating Pawnee and Eagleton, her life takes several unexpected turns.

programme.desc: Leslie aims to create a new town slogan, but runs afoul of local shock jocks. Andy scouts bands to play the Unity Concert and discovers an interesting secret about Ron, while Tom looks for a restaurant locale with Donna and April.

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie throws a hasty Galentine's Day in attempt to find a replacement for Ann. Tom and Ben look to finalize a deal on tents for the Unity Concert, while Ron finds himself looking after Andy.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: When a young nursing student at Binghamton University in New York went missing, her roommates used the app Find My Friends to track her down. What the app led them to launched an international manhunt for her killer.

programme.title: Wives With Knives
programme.desc: After two failed relationships Michelle Covington is swept off her feet by a former high school classmate. But excessive drinking makes him abusive. The couple gets in a nasty fight with the boyfriend in danger of bleeding to death from a stab wound.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: Pennsylvania native Janet Lynn Mickey's greatest dream is to start her own family. So, when she marries college football-star Darrell Tyburski her future seems secure. But when the young couple has children, they are led down the darkest path.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: Three men die over a span of a dozen years, with no suspicion of wrongdoing and no files charged. But when a deadly car explosion rips through downtown Pensacola, Florida, a new investigation begins. And all suspicion points toward just one person.

programme.title: In Plain Sight
programme.desc: Single mother Dana Laskowski is found strangled to death in her home one night when her triplets are visiting their father. The crime scene suggests she knew her attacker and it seems there are a few people who had an unhealthy obsession with her.

programme.title: In Plain Sight
programme.desc: When two friends are shot to death in their beds, the words 'Satan loves you' is left as a message in the kitchen. As the case widens, it becomes clear that there are several people who may have wanted these women dead, and Satan isn't one of them.

programme.title: A Time to Kill
programme.desc: A 63-year-old man is gunned down in his own home just days before Christmas. As investigators in Spokane, Washington dig into the victim's business life in search of a motive, they uncover a host of shady deals and a few desperate men.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Each time she was targeted by an anonymous predator, Sarah Garone ran to her stepfather, Gary Hardy. She always felt something about Gary was creepy, but as the events got more disturbing, she never imagined someone trusted could be the one to hurt her.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: In Calgary, Alberta, 24-year-old Ryan Lane receives a late-night call and heads out to meet the mystery caller. He is never heard from again. Calgary Police Service turns to surveillance video to locate Ryan and finds evidence of a shocking betrayal.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: For years, locals have feared a stretch of highway that is notorious for disappearances. Then a teenager goes missing after meeting someone online, and police discover a predator far more dangerous than they ever imagined - a serial killer on the loose.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: When a new tenant in a Harlem apartment building has his advances toward his upstairs neighbor rebuffed, his anger sets off a chain of accusations, threats, and fights that culminate in bloodshed and shocking tragedy.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: A lively slumber party turns into a nightmare when a loving mother, Dianne Watts, her young daughter, and her daughter's friend, are murdered. The town of McMinnville is turned upside down, knowing there is a killer amongst them.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: A deceased female's brutally beaten and sexually assaulted body turns up in Farmington, New Mexico. With an unidentified victim and plenty of suspects, detectives struggle with one of the most challenging 'whodunits' of their career.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: The streets of Kalamazoo, Michigan are awash with rumors about 69-year-old, William Gray.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: When the battered body of Bianca Rainer, mother of two young girls, is found in rural Arkansas, the police have just one unusual clue, a puzzle piece found stuck to her body. But they know if they find the missing puzzle, they will find her murderer.

programme.title: Forbidden: Dying for Love
programme.desc: A married man embarks on a forbidden relationship with his 14-year-old babysitter. When his wife finds out, he will stop at nothing to keep his affair secret from the police.

programme.title: Fatal Vows
programme.desc: Jodie is Edgar's secret high school crush. After a chance meeting, the two get together quickly. But money trouble, jealousy and a rebellious stepdaughter are about to turn this second chance at love into the high school reunion from hell.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: 24-year-old Yale PHD student, Annie Le, goes missing. CCTV shows Annie arrive at Yale, but she is not seen leaving. All evidence points to something happening to Annie inside. Police search every inch of the building, until they find something horrific.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: When loving couple Gary and Linda Haas fail to reach their vacation campsite, New Mexico State Police are called in to investigate. With no forensic evidence and no witnesses, all they can do is scour CCTV footage for clues to unravel the mystery.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: 15-year-old Sierra LaMar leaves for school like any other day, only to disappear without a trace. Surveillance footage helps reveal if she is just another typical runaway or if something a lot worse happens to Sierra.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A young family buys a rural piece of paradise. Still, the gate on their land that prevents neighbours from accessing their property soon becomes an angry, ultimately fatal, bone of contention.

programme.title: See No Evil

programme.title: See No Evil

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Two can keep a secret, if one of them is dead. These Deadly Women think they've committed the perfect murders.

programme.title: Obsession: Dark Desires
programme.desc: A single mom is stalked by her ex-boyfriend's son for 22 years.

programme.desc: A teenager vanishes during a walk to the store on a cold winter night. The next morning police find her lifeless body in a snowbank six miles away.

programme.desc: Rob Nelson investigates rumors of a secret underground escape route used by the infamous gangster Al Capone. Washington State, Rob tries to uncover who or what built a vast landscape of earthen mounds in Washington State.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: New theories claim that the legendary sunken city of Atlantis could have actually been in the Americas. Rob Nelson and Stefan Burns use cutting-edge technology to investigate evidence that might shed more light on one of the world's greatest mysteries.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: When an infamous pirate city sunk into the sea after a massive earthquake, a wealthy pirate's treasure might have disappeared with it. Rob and Stefan use cutting-edge technology to hunt for the treasure of Henry Morgan.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Rob Nelson descends into a cave 30 feet beneath Texas in search of evidence of a mass extinction event. Then, he heads to Lake Michigan to investigate an unexplained, Bermuda Triangle-like phenomenon that has caused ships to disappear for centuries.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: After a 2,500-year-old mummy is discovered in Siberia, locals report strange, cataclysmic events that point to an ancient curse; using cutting-edge archaeology, experts reveal who this person was and if they've unleashed something sinister.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: Three graves are discovered on the frozen beach of an uninhabited Arctic island, and the mummified corpses inside may answer a centuries-old mystery of an expedition that was literally consumed by the cannibalistic insanity of its mutinous crew.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: A top-secret military base hidden deep in the ice beyond the Arctic Circle is one of the Cold War's most elaborate cover-ups, and recently declassified documents reveal its deadly purpose, and the threat it might still pose to all humankind.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: When strange towers of ice are found growing from in a barren, water-starved desert, experts speculate why these structures have uncanny similarities to extraterrestrial formations recently discovered on Pluto's alien landscape.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: Experts make a chilling new discovery when they unearth a 30,000-year-old zombie virus from an icy grave. If this ancient disease is successfully resuscitated back to life, it could cause a catastrophic global calamity.

programme.title: Secrets in the Ice
programme.desc: A frozen lake deep in the Himalayas melts once a year to expose hundreds of human bones and a centuries-old mystery of astonishing carnage, leaving experts to speculate if it was a single catastrophic event or something much more sinister.

programme.title: Underground Marvels
programme.desc: Residents devised an ingenious trick to keep the location of buried ancient city hidden five stories underground secret from invaders; experts reveal what it was, and using the latest tech, they reveal the truth behind this strange place.

programme.title: Underground Marvels
programme.desc: An eerie system of underground vaults in Scotland was once the hideout for thieves who stole newly-buried bodies and sold them; today, experts are excavating these rubble-filled caves to reveal the secrets of what these bandits left behind.

programme.title: Underground Marvels
programme.desc: Caverns hidden deep inside a remote mountain are home to a precious mineral found nowhere else on earth, and experts and treasure hunters use cutting-edge technology to follow rumours of a mysterious long-lost mine in search of a payday.

programme.title: Underground Marvels
programme.desc: A strange underground system known as the Black Cave is connected to a fairytale castle and was home to an infamous nobleman on the run from the law; today, experts investigate the secrets he left here to discover new parts of this mysterious network.

programme.title: Underground Marvels
programme.desc: A labyrinth of vast tunnels in the French countryside has served as a secret hideout during wartime for centuries, and on its walls, experts have discovered the final confessions of soldiers who fought here during one of the deadliest days of World War I.

programme.title: Underground Marvels

programme.title: What on Earth?

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: A woman's wealthy, abusive ex commits apparent suicide, leaving his fortune to her. However, after lethal events begin to occur around her she begins to believe she is being targeted by an unseen stalker.

programme.title: Doctor Sleep
programme.desc: A man with psychic powers protects a young girl with similar abilities from a cult.

programme.title: Queen & Slim
programme.desc: Two people out on their first date go on the run after they are forced to kill a violent police officer who attacks them during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Impostor
programme.desc: An engineer creates a weapon to battle aliens, only to be suspected as an alien himself.

programme.title: Supernova
programme.desc: A deep space medical rescue team must fight an alien that is planning to destroy the universe.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Benjamin was born as an elderly man. As he grows up he gets younger which is hard on the people around him. He meets a woman while he is in his forties but he gets younger as she ages.
A naive young man gets caught up in the glamour of Manhattan's Studio 54.

programme.title: A Family Thing
programme.desc: When a white man learns that his birth mother was black, he travels to Chicago to meet his new family.

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: The gang returns to Michigan for their 10 year high school reunion.

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: Twenty years after a boy died while performing in a school play, a group of friends breaks into the school at night to sabotage the set of the resurrected version of the production. Strange occurrences quickly go from eerie to terrifying.

programme.title: Munich
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the terrorist attack that came to be known as Black September, five men are chosen by the Israeli government to root out those responsible.

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc: While visiting Russia, John McClane discovers his son, Jack, is a CIA operative. Together, John and Jack battle against a nuclear weapons heist in Russia.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: His whole life, Danny has been used to fight in illegal gladiator fights. Controlled only by a collar he wears around his neck, he has never known any human emotion; a car crash leaves his 'owner' in a coma, and Danny is left on his own in the world.

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Amidst escalating violence in New York, a young man seeks to avenge his father's murder and restore peace to the area.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: On the verge of having their conspiracy exposed, members of the government will stop at nothing to erase all evidence of their top secret programs, even the agents involved.

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: A grieving couple agrees to have a doctor clone their recently deceased eight year-old son. Everything seems fine until their new son reaches the age at which he previously died, and strange things begin to occur.

programme.title: Rounders
programme.desc: A student who vows to give up gambling is forced to play for high stakes to help a friend.

programme.title: I Think I Love My Wife
programme.desc: Richard Cooper, a bored family man, considers having an affair with an old friend but doesn't want to jeopardize his marriage.

programme.title: View From the Top
programme.desc: A small-town woman attempts to achieve her goal of becoming a flight attendant.

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: A surfer girl falls for a football player while preparing for an important competition.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: Buddy Hall and Steve Finch are two feuding neighbours, who try to prove to the other that they have more Holiday spirit by overly decorating their houses.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: The Brady family is back and facing serious financial trouble. With $20,000 in back taxes owned, the family risks losing their beloved home to their neighbour. The kids plot to secretly raise the money so they don't have to move to somewhere else.

programme.title: Stand and Deliver
programme.desc: A tough teacher inspires his East L.A. students to go on to greater achievements.

programme.title: Toys
programme.desc: The dying wish of a toy maker is to have his brother run his toy factory instead of his son. The brother begins making war toys and the son has to save the factory.

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: After refusing a mission, an assassin is forced to hide out in a small town.

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: Diagnosed with dementia and forced into retirement, a veteran CIA agent goes rogue when he learns that his old nemesis has turned up once again. He sets out on an intercontinental mission to take his enemy down before his illness takes over in earnest.

programme.title: Richard Jewell
programme.desc: A security guard who prevented casualties from a bomb planted at the 1996 Atlanta Olympics is vilified by the media, who falsely report he is a terrorist involved in the incident.

programme.title: Hackers

programme.title: Proof of Life

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: After witnessing the assassination of the Defence Secretary, a police officer uncovers a conspiracy that implicates high-ranking officials.

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A militant general threatens the stability desired by peaceful ape leader Caesar.

programme.title: Reds
programme.desc: Inspired by witnessing the 1917 Russian Revolution, radical American journalist John Reed and feminist Louise Bryant tried to bring about a similar revolution in the United States.

programme.title: In Good Company
programme.desc: Follows the working relationship that develops between a middle age advertising executive and the young inexperienced business protégé that he finds himself working for after a corporate takeover.

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: An eccentric, childless couple decide to kidnap one baby from a set of quintuplets.

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two high school computer hackers set out to create the woman of their dreams, and succeed.

programme.title: The Dark Half
programme.desc: A fictional character manifests itself in physical form and begins killing people.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: A special agent becomes a vigilante after a ruthless assassin murders all of his loved ones during a family reunion.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: Frank Castle's overzealous vengeance creates an archenemy out of misjudgement. Trying to leave it all behind, Frank hangs up his guns and tries to lead the semblance of the normal life. But Jigsaw hasn't forgotten and wants his turn at vengeance.

programme.title: The Betrayed
programme.desc: A young woman undergoes a psychological journey directed by a mysterious stranger who believes her husband is guilty of stealing from a crime syndicate.

programme.title: The Falcon and the Snowman
programme.desc: A disillusioned CIA employee and his childhood friend become spies for the Soviet Union.

programme.title: Special Effects
programme.desc: A filmmaker directs a movie based on a murder he committed.

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: This film chronicles the sinking of the whaling ship Essex by an enormous whale. This event, which happened in real life, inspired author Herman Melville to write his famous novel Moby Dick.

programme.title: Belly
programme.desc: Two partners in crime who rob nightclubs together begin to question each other's loyalty.

programme.title: Die Hard II: Die Harder
programme.desc: A detective battles terrorists at an airport when a plot threatens hundreds of passengers.

programme.title: The Conspirator
programme.desc: A novice lawyer reluctantly agrees to defend the only woman charged in association with the death of Abraham Lincoln.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: In Thailand, a group of Christian aid workers recruit John Rambo to guide them up the Salween River to deliver medical supplies to the Karen tribe of neighbouring Burma (aka Myanmar).

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: A woman's wealthy, abusive ex commits apparent suicide, leaving his fortune to her. However, after lethal events begin to occur around her she begins to believe she is being targeted by an unseen stalker.

programme.title: Doctor Sleep
programme.desc: A man with psychic powers protects a young girl with similar abilities from a cult.

programme.title: Queen & Slim
programme.desc: Two people out on their first date go on the run after they are forced to kill a violent police officer who attacks them during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Impostor
programme.desc: An engineer creates a weapon to battle aliens, only to be suspected as an alien himself.

programme.title: Supernova
programme.desc: A deep space medical rescue team must fight an alien that is planning to destroy the universe.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Benjamin was born as an elderly man. As he grows up he gets younger which is hard on the people around him. He meets a woman while he is in his forties but he gets younger as she ages.
A naive young man gets caught up in the glamour of Manhattan's Studio 54.

programme.title: A Family Thing
programme.desc: When a white man learns that his birth mother was black, he travels to Chicago to meet his new family.

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: The gang returns to Michigan for their 10 year high school reunion.

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: Twenty years after a boy died while performing in a school play, a group of friends breaks into the school at night to sabotage the set of the resurrected version of the production. Strange occurrences quickly go from eerie to terrifying.

programme.title: Munich

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: His whole life, Danny has been used to fight in illegal gladiator fights. Controlled only by a collar he wears around his neck, he has never known any human emotion; a car crash leaves his 'owner' in a coma, and Danny is left on his own in the world.

programme.desc: Aaron's father's funeral turns into chaos when his extended family arrives. An uncle complains about his daughter's boyfriend, a cousin inadvertently gives her fiancé LSD, and family secrets are revealed.

programme.title: No Way Out
programme.desc: The secretary of defence and his loyal aid try to cover up the murder of a call girl.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: A brutal serial killer resurfaces to play cat and mouse with his FBI Agent nemesis.

programme.desc: A British drug addict is sent to a notorious prison where, as the only foreigner, he finds himself at the bottom of the brutal and violent social order. When he joins the organized prison boxing matches, begins moving rapidly up the rankings.
